metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8400 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
The HTTPS fallback implementation in Shell In A Box (aka shellinabox)before 2.19 makes it easier for remote attackers to conduct DNS rebindingattacks via the "/plain" URL.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8400` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

shellinabox - 2.19
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: shellinabox package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.19').
